body: Well, this is abit embarrasing to me since teamspeak is popular and Idk about it, So what is teamspeak ive heard alot about it on youtube and now its appearing on the forums alot due to the staff applications and the teamspeak issues so what is teamspeak and how do I get it what do I need to do

title: How do I use teamspeak?

replies.body:
Ayo! no need to worry bout not knowing. 

TeamSpeak, commonly referred to as TS, is nifty thing that allows you to talk to players through voice chat and text. It's similar to Ventrillo and Mumble if you've heard of either of those.

It's super duper easy to get started. Here is a download link. You can really easily learn from there once you're on. The community is really friendly and any player will be willing to show you the ropes. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask. I used to go on all the time :)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: First, download TeamSpeak. You can search that up in Google. Once you have TS up, connect to ts.avicus.net in order to connect to their TS server! I can give you an in-depth tutorial if you are using Mac.
